keyword: nhà hàng ở Quận 1, TP. Hồ Chí Minh
name: Hàng Dương Quán Q1

location_info.title: Hàng Dương Quán Q1
location_info.address: 32-34 Ngô Đức Kế, Bến Nghé, Quận 1, Hồ Chí Minh

most_relevant_reviews.name: Ly anna
most_relevant_reviews.review: I had such a great experience here today, from the food to the service and atmosphere. Fresh and alive seafood is what makes this place stand out from the rest. They also have a unique style dry aged fish which was absolutely amazing and …

most_relevant_reviews.name: Tin Ly
most_relevant_reviews.review: Came here to try the new dry aged fish and Wow it did not disappoint! The quality was on-par with if not better than what I’ve had in Australia. Their steamed egg with truffle is another Must try, velvety and decadent but most importantly …

most_relevant_reviews.name: Thang Nguyen
most_relevant_reviews.review:
This is a luxury restaurant with an extremely beautiful location right in the center of Ho Chi Minh City. This area will be very difficult to park a car.
The restaurant serves high-value seafood, besides that is a traditional …

most_relevant_reviews.name: Tuan Dinh
most_relevant_reviews.review: a very nice view of the city center at night. Unique delicious food and friendly staff

most_relevant_reviews.name: Ani Nguyen
most_relevant_reviews.review: The squid there was perfectly fried. Never ate better squid in Saigon elsewhere. Judging from their appereance the staff seemed very professional, though they were rather careless in the late night hours. However the view on the 11th floor makes all up for it. Very much recommended!:)

most_relevant_reviews.name: Jimmy Paek
most_relevant_reviews.review: Overpriced food and no English speaking staff available.  Had a nice view but food were too bland.

most_relevant_reviews.name: Vu Dong Nguyen Huynh
most_relevant_reviews.review: Decent food but the price is on the expensive side. It is not a family to-go but more a place for business dining. The room is private, vintage-ish and and their service is awesome. You will have at least 1 dedicated servant and sometimes …

most_relevant_reviews.name: khai pham-huy
most_relevant_reviews.review: Foods are delicious..  Yet service need to be improved... we had to push up staff for foods.. It seemed that we're forgotten,, even there were only few tables on the roof floor.

most_relevant_reviews.name: Ocean Blue
most_relevant_reviews.review: Nice view and fresh seafood + delicious food. However, the price is a quite high
